FuncDef: This command specifies the maximum received reconstructed unit (MRRU), similar to a maximum transmission unit (MTU), but applies only to MLPPP multilink bundles. The MRRU is the maximum frame size that can be reconstructed from multilink fragments. This command is only valid for MLPPP bundles.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the maximum received reconstructed unit size, in bytes. Values-1500 to 9206.
